trajectory.mention: Let us now go back to Lancaster
trajectory.note: starting point for a circuitous route

trajectory.mention: The direct road thence to Kendal is 22 miles
Travellers from the North would do well to go from Carlisle by Wigton , and proceed along the Lake of Bassenthwaite to Keswick
and along the fell to the foot of Grasmere Lake
The direct road from Grasmere to Keswick
Borrowdale is also conveniently seen on the way to Wastdale over Styhead; or, to Buttermere

trajectory.note: final destination in the travel sequence

route_summary: Lancaster → Kendal → Bowness → Ambleside → Grasmere → Keswick → Buttermere → Wastdale → Ullswater
